name: Achievements
author: Samael
description: Achievement system tracking kills (zombies, players, NPCs), item pickups, playtime, deaths, and multi-objective challenges with rewards

name: Animations
author: Samael
description: Roleplay animations (/act commands) including surrender, salute, cross arms, attention, typing poses, and combat stances that interrupt on movement

name: ArcCW Attachments
author: Samael
description: Creates inventory items for all ArcCW weapon attachments

name: Armor
author: Samael
description: Adds Funny Armors

name: Banking
author: Samael
description: Full banking system with multiple accounts, deposits/withdrawals, transfers, item storage, check writing/redemption, ATMs, and paycheck integration

name: Black Market NPC
author: Samael
description: Provides features such as Sells illegal weapons and contraband, Limited stock with restock timers, Requires players to find secret location, Prices configurable via script, and Great for underground roleplay.

name: Clothing System
author: Samael
description: Bonemerge clothing system attaching hats, glasses, shirts, pants, shoes, ties, vests, rings, and accessories to players with vendor purchase and persistence

name: Cameras
author: Samael
description: Security camera and CCTV monitor system for surveillance with faction-restricted access and live feed viewing

name: Car Dealer
author: Samael
description: Provides features such as Purchase vehicles from a dealer NPC, Return or repair owned vehicles for a fee, Custom paint jobs and bodygroup modifications with configurable price, Garages store vehicles safely, and Integrates with driving addons.

name: Car Options
author: Samael
description: Vehicle quality of life features including CD player system with music tracks, albums, and audio streaming for in-car entertainment

name: Car Spawner
author: Samael
description: Module for spawning themed cars for players.

name: Mobile Phones
author: Samael
description: Mobile phone system with unique phone numbers, voice calling, text messaging, and contact management for player communication

name: Chess and Droughts
author: Samael
description: Interactive chess and checkers (draughts) board games with multiplayer support, wagering system, and leaderboard tracking

name: Clearance Levels
author: Samael
description: Adds clearance level system to doors

name: Corpses & Looting
author: Samael
description: Corpse looting system allowing players to search dead bodies, transfer items and money, with configurable search distance and anti-spam protection

name: Crafting
author: Samael
description: Recipe-based crafting system with crafting stations (forge, workbench), time-based progress, attribute requirements, tool dependencies, and faction restrictions

name: Tying
author: Samael
description: Player restraint system with ropes/cuffs, blindfolding, gagging, dragging, and body searching mechanics for hostage scenarios

name: Daily Rewards
author: Samael
description: Daily rewards system with 20 objectives (walking, chatting, playtime, money, interactions, jobs, building, vehicles, arrests, healing, property, lockpicking, paychecks, ads, emergencies, XP, voting, crimes, spending, sprinting) and escalating streak bonuses at 14/30/60/90 days.

name: Delivery NPC
author: Samael
description: Provides features such as Offers parcel delivery side jobs, Random drop-off locations per mission, Pays players money on completion, NPC shows delivery progress via dialog, and Encourages exploration of the map.

name: Drugs
author: Samael
description: Drug cultivation, processing, consumption, and addiction system with effects like speed boost, damage reduction, and stamina regeneration

name: Death Trooper Scrambler
author: Samael
description: Communication scrambler system for Death Trooper faction allowing private, encrypted voice communications with sound effects for non-authorized listeners

name: Events
author: Samael
description: Map-based NPC event system with configurable spawn positions, player count requirements, automatic timers, and staff/player notifications

name: Extraction
author: Samael
description: Raid-style extraction system requiring players to reach escape zones within countdown timer, with configurable positions per map and audio/visual cues

name: Fence NPC
author: Samael
description: Provides features such as Buy stolen items from players, Pay based on item reward values, Support for all robbery items, and Secure transaction system.

name: Dynamic Food
author: Samael
description: Restaurant cooking system with cooking machines, customer orders, ingredient fridges, worktables, dish preparation, and hunger restoration mechanics

name: Gathering System
author: Samael
description: Resource gathering from trees (spruce, sticks, sap) and rocks (iron/gold/silver ore, coal), fishing system with pole/bait and fish types (trout, bass, catfish, perch) plus junk, crafting materials (ingots, wood, swords), and stackable inventory management.

name: Help NPCs
author: Samael
description: Provides features such as Provides information to new players, Can give basic starter items, Dialog tree explains server mechanics, Directs players to other NPC services, and Simple friendly conversation.

name: ID System
author: Samael
description: ID card system allowing players to show/request/force view IDs with multiple designs (California, German, New York, Southside, Yorkshire) and character recognition mechanics.

name: Injuries System
author: Samael
description: Adds indepth damage to legs with side effects

name: Leveling
author: Samael
description: Character leveling system with XP, skill points, and skill tree (Endurance: +25 health, Combat Training: +15% damage, Engineering: +15% tool effectiveness/+30% repair speed) with dependencies, F1 menu integration, and admin adjustment tools.

name: Limb Damage
author: Samael
description: Limb damage system where leg shots cause configurable sprint delay with automatic healing and toggleable enable/disable functionality

name: Lockpicking
author: Samael
description: Door lockpicking system with 4 difficulty levels (Basic, Copper Easy, Silver Medium, Gold Hard), job restrictions (thieves can lockpick, police cannot), and configurable success margins with interactive mini-game

name: Lootables
author: Samael
description: Searchable loot containers (cardboard boxes, wooden crates, metal barrels, lockers, safes) with rarity tiers (Common/Uncommon/Rare/Legendary/Unique), skill requirements (strength/luck), alarm systems, and cooldown timers for exploration-based item gathering.

name: LSCS Compatibility
author: Samael
description: Adds compatibility with LSCS (Lightsaber Combat System) for enhanced lightsaber combat mechanics.

name: Marketplace
author: Samael
description: Provides features such as Marketplace system for player-to-player trading, Buy and sell items with no expiration dates, Configurable listing limits and minimum prices, NPC vendor interface for easy access, Search and filter functionality for items, Economic system integration for server economy, and Super admin item removal tools.

name: Medals
author: Samael
description: Persistent medal award system displayed on character profiles with staff permissions for giving/taking medals and admin controls

name: Police Suite
author: Samael
description: Comprehensive police system with stun weapons, crime tracking, warrants, arrests, police NPCs, and computer database for law enforcement management.

name: Improved Constructable Props
author: Samael
description: Constructable prop system with furniture items (boxes, cabinets, chairs, tables, couches) requiring resources and supporting upgrades into functional entities

name: Radio Voice Chat
author: Samael
description: Handheld radio voice chat system with frequency tuning, encrypted channels, faction access, static radios, and range-based communication

name: Ranking
author: Samael
description: Ranking system for the gamemode

name: Realtor
author: Samael
description: Property creation and management system with tool-based door selection.

name: Recruiter NPC
author: Samael
description: Provides a Recruiter NPC that allows players to join or resign from a list of configured jobs. Features dynamic dialog options based on player

name: Referrals
author: Samael
description: Player referral system allowing players to refer others and earn monetary rewards when referred players join, with configurable reward amounts and admin management tools.

name: Store Robbery
author: Samael
description: Store robbery system with jewelry cases and cash registers, stealable items (cash, jewelry, watches, rings), police requirements, and respawn timers

name: Taxi NPC
author: Samael
description: Provides features such as Spawns taxi vehicles for hire, NPC teleports you to preset locations, Charges fee based on distance, Checks if player already owns a taxi, and Uses workshop vehicle models.

name: Territories
author: Samael
description: Faction control point system with configurable capture zones, NPC defenders, HUD status display, and rewards for holding territories

name: Car Bomb
author: Samael
description: Terrorism mechanics with vehicle car bombs (engine-activated) and door explosives, both with timed detonation, remote detonation, and debris creation
